n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>CHINOOK</SCHEMA> <NAME>JV$PLAYLIST</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_FLAG</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_SUBSCRIBER</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>JRN_DATE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PLAYLISTID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select decode(TARG.ROWID, null, 'D', 'I') JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE JRN_DATE, JRN.PLAYLISTID PLAYLISTID, TARG.NAME NAME from ( select L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER JRN_SUBSCRIBER, L.PLAYLISTID PLAYLISTID, max(L.JRN_DATE) JRN_DATE from CHINOOK.J$PLAYLIST L where L.JRN_CONSUMED = '1' group by L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, L.PLAYLISTID ) JRN, CHINOOK.PLAYLIST TARG where JRN.PLAYLISTID = TARG.PLAYLISTID (+)</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
